title: Why it feels right to be uncomfortable
itunes:title: Why it feels right to be uncomfortable
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

  

 

In today's podcast we talk about the takeaways we each had from our last PNPTribe event.

 

We call it camp, but it's really a time when Tribe members come together to learn more about themselves and what they need to do to lose weight and improve their well-being.

 

I coach all weekend and say amazing things. Listen in to hear some of the many pearls of wisdom that I came up with, including one about how to best handle being uncomfortable, and why you should do it.
